name: You and I and the Long, Long Drive
name_original: You and I and the Long, Long Drive
description:
Idle talk between a pair of people on a road trip to Pluto.

Note: if there's no music you may need to click inside of the frame to get it to play. Thank you Chrome.

Credits:
bitsy by Adam Le Doux
javascript dialog and transparent sprites hacks by Sean LeBlanc
